page.title: 16SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: The common major concern in the area is that of traffic.On the A533 which runs through the village the speed limit is 40mph.Residents feel this should be lowered to 30mph.In Scholar Green there are moves to inrease the speed on the A34 from 30mph to 40mph. again residents are against this. On the canal in Rode Heath there is a redundant steel lock.Children despite warnings use this as a climbing frame. Residents fear a fatility.There is also the danger of the canal both in summer and in winter when it is covered with ice. There is also concern over the facilities for the younger generations.The youth club is desperately trying to provide it's own building but there is much concern over the siting of the building from the longer established residents.
